name: Weightless (Magic Ball's Knights)
description:
Sometimes you do little but learn a lot. About programming, about lights, and also about stopping to compete against yourself.

This game's atmosphere became about my struggle to finish it, about this floating state you enter in the middle of a jam's last night.

How to play :

  • Get to the last platform using your double jump
  • NEVER touch the statues
  • Press R to restart the level
